Project2

Class MainMenuState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • Project2.MainMenuState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState

    public class MainMenuState
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
    Provides a user interface for transitioning into the single player menu, multi player menu, options menu, and quitting the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  MainMenuState.MainMenuChoices
      defines the menu choices available.

      void init(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer, org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame stateBasedGame)
      Initializes the MainMenuState; loads image resources, sets the initial menu choice.
      private void ProcessInputCommand(InputManager.InputCommands inputCommand, org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame stateBasedGame)
      Swaps the MenuItem image and sets the current menu choice with up and down input commands, confirms selection with 'hit' commands.
      void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer, org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame stateBasedGame, org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics)
      calls the MenuItem.renderItem() method for each of the items in main menu.
      void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer, org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame stateBasedGame, int i)
      processes input with InputManager then uses the results in the ProcessInputCommand().

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenuState

        public MainMenuState(int stateId)
        constructor sets the stateId of the MainMenu instance. The stateId passed from Project2.java is constant but needs to be passed down so the ID is common and global.
        Parameters:
        stateId - int variable that is used to designate that this is a MenuState

      • enter

        public void enter(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
                  org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game)
           throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        upon entering the state the MenuItem objects are instantiated. Each menu choice is given a position, off image, on image and a name. These are arguments to the MenuItem constructor.
        Specified by:
        enter in interface org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState
        Overrides:
        enter in class org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer,
                   org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame stateBasedGame,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        calls the MenuItem.renderItem() method for each of the items in main menu. A string is drawn to screen showing the accurate menu selection as opposed to the png currently being used which are placeholders till menu art is complete.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • update

        public void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer,

        Swaps the MenuItem image and sets the current menu choice with up and down input commands, confirms selection with 'hit' commands.
